nodes.text: Amaran was a female Rattataki slave who served Lord Serjay Thul during the Cold War. She relayed his pleas of help to fellow Imperials.

Mistress Amaran appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where she gave Imperial players the bonus series for Alderaan. She, along with her Republic counterpart Sergeant Collo and the Nar Shaddaa bonus series mission givers, were removed in Game Update 4.1.
